content: You're right, "mastering technology" may be a bit of an exaggeration, as technology is constantly evolving and changing. A better way to phrase it would be "staying up-to-date with the latest technology and tools related to the trade or industry" or "having a strong proficiency and understanding of technology and its application in the trade or industry." This highlights the importance of continuously learning and updating one's skills in order to keep up with industry developments and advancements.
